issues.issueMessage:
Field description: Manufacturer's designation of software version of the equipment that produced
the measurements.

Field description: The serial number of the equipment that produced the measurements.
A pseudonym can also be used to prevent the equipment from being
identifiable, so long as each pseudonym is unique within the dataset.
Field description: Text of the instructions given to participants before the recording.

Field description: [URI](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#uniform-resource-indicator)
of the corresponding [Cognitive Atlas](https://www.cognitiveatlas.org/)
Task term.

Field description: [URI](SPEC_ROOT/common-principles.md#uniform-resource-indicator)
of the corresponding [CogPO](http://www.cogpo.org/) term.

Field description: The department in the institution in charge of the equipment that produced
the measurements.
Field description: Number of ECoG channels.
Field description: Number of SEEG channels.
Field description: Length of the recording in seconds (for example, `3600`).

Field description: Maximum head movement (in mm) detected during the recording,
as measured by the head localization coils (for example, `4.8`).

Field description: Object of temporal hardware filters applied, or `"n/a"` if the data is not
available. Each key-value pair in the JSON object is a name of the filter and
an object in which its parameters are defined as key-value pairs.
For example, `{"Highpass RC filter": {"Half amplitude cutoff (Hz)":
0.0159, "Roll-off": "6dB/Octave"}}`.
